pr_title: Fixes GH-2013 by traversing parents until sourceString is found

timeline.bodyText: Editorial: could you add open and close brackets here and in other places where you have if/else constructions?
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

timeline.bodyText:
I was wondering if maybe there could be a null check here, so that any exception is thrown when looking for the source string instead of when using the resulting string. Maybe return Objects.requireNonNull(sourceString);
Unless of course there is a case where returning null from getSourceString() is acceptable.
timeline.author: hmottestad

replies.bodyText: Thought of that for a while, but decided that if we did not found the sourceString at this point, something else was really messed up, so throwing a custom exception early, would not help much here since we do not have a resonable alternative to continue processing update further - a NPE will still be thrown in the code that uses it ...
replies.author: damyan-ognyanov
